forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
This morning, Downtown San Francisco is graced with a mix of sunshine and a few clouds drifting lazily across a backdrop of blue. As you look out over the city, the light dances on surfaces, hinting at a pleasant day, albeit one where the temperature might barely reach mid-fifties. The westward winds are at play, whispering through the streets, occasionally gracing the air with a cool edge, presenting that quintessential San Francisco feel. While the sun holds court now, be mindful of the lingering possibility of rain creeping in after dawn breaks to the east, cloaked in a promise of a gentler evening.

As the day unfolds, layering will prove wise; a light jacket and perhaps a comfortable sweater will work wonders against those brisk gusts and the evening chill. Consider traversing the streets lined with blossoming trees, or perhaps sipping on a warm drink at a favored café—an inviting retreat should the clouds gather more than expected. This isn’t a day for grandiose adventures, but instead, a perfect moment to enjoy the simple pleasure of watching the city bustle while wrapped in warmth, with your gaze punctuated by the shimmering bay and the soft visage of the Golden Gate in the distance.
